A graphics rendering command encoder object

# makeRenderCommandEncoder()

**Instance Method**

Create an object that encodes commands that perform graphics rendering operations and may be assigned to a different thread.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeRenderCommandEncoder() -> (any MTLRenderCommandEncoder)?
```

## Return Value

A graphics rendering command encoder object

## Discussion

The rendering commands encoded by [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderCommandEncoder] objects are executed in the order in which the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderCommandEncoder] objects are created, not in the order they are ended.

## Related Documentation

- **Metal Shading Language Guide**
- **Metal Programming Guide**
